name: Civist – Petitions and Fundraising
author: Civist

sections.description:
Create and configure your petition directly in your own WordPress. Publish them in a page or post and you are ready to go! Your supporters sign the petition right there, embedded in your website.

Just add a donation form to your petitions to collect SEPA and credit card donations in compliance with EU legislation.

With Civist, you manage your supporters directly in WordPress. Contacts are automatically saved in your mailing list manager. Simple!

Export your contacts and signatures as CSV-files for further processing.
sections.installation:
The easiest way of installing the Civist WordPress plugin is to use the built in plugin search of WordPress. Just search for Civist and click the “Install Now” button.

Downloading the plugin and installing it from the ZIP-file is another option. You can always find the current version at WordPress Plugin Directory. To install it:

  • Download the ZIP file
  • Go to the “Plugins” menu in the WordPress dashboard
  • Upload the civist.zip file
  • Activate the plugin

sections.reviews:
Not a local plugin

By scman on March 15, 2024

I went to try this out, the first thing I see is it wants a agreement to their site terms. From what I saw this doesn't look like a plugin that runs locally and uses your own server and resources.

Thank you for the help

By odise on March 7, 2024

I received excellent support service.
I received a very fast service and solution regarding Turkish language support and donation form stripe connection.
All my questions were answered without getting bored.
Thank you very much.
Regards

It corresponds to my expectation

By ckl6767 on July 19, 2023

This Wordpress extension meets my expectations.
Although there's no way to automatically display one or all signatures and their comments on a WordPress page or post via the Civist plugin, I can extract them in CSV format for later use.
On reflection, I find this even better, as I can select the results I want to display.
This is a petition, not a survey.
Also what is really appreciated is the support who is verry reactive.

Fast and competent support

By liip on June 1, 2023

Works perfectly for petitions, we don't need the other functions. Fast and competent support for a problem with multilingualism.

Perfect

By eleaztee on May 25, 2022

It works. Quick response.

Great support

By tsagent on June 3, 2020

While I can't speak to the donation features, I needed a simple petition form and this was very easy to setup. I had an issue post installation that was addressed and fixed via support (and within the 48 hour window for free users) Very helpful! thank you

Be careful

By Frenchy (k2300) on April 26, 2020

Nowhere on the plugin sheet is the gigantic blows of this plugin for organizations: 300 Dollars + 5% commission per donation from 50,000 signatures !! No but it's just crazy ... Better to launch your own petition site for much cheaper and much more functional than this plugin! You do not really have control over your petitions since the signatures are hosted in the cloud so this means that this plugin also has access to the signatures therefore the personal data of our signatories! We cannot even modify the texts of the plugin ... this plugin deserves to be only free with a 5% commission that's all! Anyway ... for my part I absolutely do not recommend this plugin!

The best petition plugin on the market

By martinsmrek23 on January 30, 2020

I am using Civist in my organization for all of our petitions and it has become the instrumental tool for all of our campaigns. It has very smooth modern design and is customizable enough to meet all your common campaign needs. It has successfully survived even big campaigns with tens of thousands of signatures in a matter of hours and we could easily rely on its functions. The support is very quick and capable of solving all the issues that appeared during the testing phases and the team is open to introduce new integrations and solutions. Definitely the best petition solution on the market.

Excelent Support

By santoantonio on October 31, 2019

Thank you for your support. Fernando from Brazil

Awesome Plugin!

By cybergrace on October 21, 2019

I tried a few different petition plugins that didn't work or the instructions were super-complex or they were taking way too long to figure out. Civist "just worked." I had one thing I couldn't figure out and support answered me the next day -- great for free support. I really like that this plugin is open source and free for regular functionality, and you can pay more if you want more advanced features. It is also great for collecting information and keeping it on your own server so you "own" your own info. It's also been great for low-income not-for-profits I volunteer for and I'm excited to get a more advanced project to try out the paid version on. Thanks, Civist!
